function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Novel zoonotic disease transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of new contagious diseases spreading from animals to humans","Mitigation":"Improved monitoring of wildlife health and ecosystems, and reducing human-wildlife interactions","Technologies":"Remote sensing, wildlife tracking devices, and disease surveillance systems","People":"Conservationists, wildlife researchers, and local communities","Owner":"Conservation organizations, government agencies, and local communities"},{"Description":"Premature death of conservationists due to COVID-19","Impact":"Loss of expertise and advocacy in conservation efforts, as well as psychological impacts on colleagues","Mitigation":"Strict adherence to health protocols, vaccination, and support for mental health","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, vaccination programs, and mental health support services","People":"Conservationists, environmental researchers, and indigenous communities","Owner":"Government health agencies, conservation organizations, and mental health professionals"},{"Description":"Environmental, economic, and societal changes","Impact":"Predicted global biodiversity loss, climate change, and slow but monumental irreversible changes","Mitigation":"Sustainable conservation practices, climate change adaptation strategies, and biodiversity protection measures","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, habitat restoration tools, and climate monitoring systems","People":"Global population, indigenous communities, and conservation organizations","Owner":"Governments, conservation organizations, and climate action groups"}]}
